import { useState } from "react" import memeData from "../memeData" const Meme =()=> { const [meme, setMeme] = useState ({ topText: "", bottomText: "", randomImage: "http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) const [allMemeImages, setAllImages] = useState(memeData) const getMeme =()=> { const memes = allMemeImages.data.memes let idx = Math.floor(Math.random() * memes.length) // console.log(memes[idx].url) setMeme(prevState => ({ ...prevState, randomImage: memes[idx].url })) } const handleChange =(event)=> { const { name, value } = event.target setMeme(prevState => ({...prevState, [name]: value})) } return (

{meme.topText}

{meme.bottomText}

) } export default Meme
